title: Blackletter font
content:
I am afraid that this is custom-designed, but I figured I would give it a go to see if my hunch is wrong.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423212949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontid2_4938.jpg)

 [‹ Slab Serif circa 1940- Dreamland Theatre](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423212949/http:/typophile.com/node/44315 "Go to previous forum topic") [Edgewater type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423212949/http:/typophile.com/node/44313 "Go to next forum topic")
author: andrewesque

comments.content: Looks to me like a modified [**Clairvaux**](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423212949/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/clairvaux/). No, close, but not an exact match...
